description: Describes a program within a channel. For information about programs, see Working with programs in the MediaTailor User Guide.

parameters.name: ChannelName
parameters.description: The name of the channel associated with this Program.

nested_items.name: AdBreaks
nested_items.description: The ad break configuration settings.

nested_items.name: MessageType
nested_items.description: The SCTE-35 ad insertion type. Accepted value: SPLICE_INSERT, TIME_SIGNAL.

nested_items.name: OffsetMillis
nested_items.description: How long (in milliseconds) after the beginning of the program that an ad starts. This value must fall within 100ms of a segment boundary, otherwise the ad break will be skipped.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The name of the source location where the slate VOD source is stored.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The slate VOD source name. The VOD source must already exist in a source location before it can be used for slate.

nested_items.name: SpliceInsertMessage
nested_items.description: This defines the SCTE-35 splice_insert() message inserted around the ad. For information about using splice_insert(), see the SCTE-35 specficiaiton, section 9.7.3.1.

nested_items.name: AvailNum
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.avail_num, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: AvailsExpected
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.avails_expected, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: SpliceEventId
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.splice_event_id, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: UniqueProgramId
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.unique_program_id, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: TimeSignalMessage
nested_items.description: Defines the SCTE-35 time_signal message inserted around the ad.

nested_items.name: SegmentationDescriptors
nested_items.description: The configurations for the SCTE-35 segmentation_descriptor message(s) sent with the time_signal message.

nested_items.name: SegmentationEventId
nested_items.description: The Event Identifier to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_event_id message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: SegmentationUpidType
nested_items.description: The Upid Type to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_upid_type message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 14.

nested_items.name: SegmentationUpid
nested_items.description: The Upid to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_upid message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. The value must be a hexadecimal string containing only the characters 0 though 9 and A through F. The default value is '' (an empty string).

nested_items.name: SegmentationTypeId
nested_items.description: The Type Identifier to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_type_id message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 48.

nested_items.name: SegmentNum
nested_items.description: The segment number to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segment_num message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 0.

nested_items.name: SegmentsExpected
nested_items.description: The number of segments expected, which is assigned to the segmentation_descriptor.segments_expectedS message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 0.

nested_items.name: SubSegmentNum
nested_items.description: The sub-segment number to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.sub_segment_num message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The defualt value is null.

nested_items.name: SubSegmentsExpected
nested_items.description: The number of sub-segments expected, which is assigned to the segmentation_descriptor.sub_segments_expected message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is null.

nested_items.name: AdBreakMetadata
nested_items.description: Defines a list of key/value pairs that MediaTailor generates within the EXT-X-ASSET``tag for ``SCTE35_ENHANCED output.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: For SCTE35_ENHANCED output, defines a key. MediaTailor takes this key, and its associated value, and generates the key/value pair within the ``EXT-X-ASSET``tag. If you specify a key, you must also specify a corresponding value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: For SCTE35_ENHANCED output, defines a value. MediaTailor; takes this value, and its associated key, and generates the key/value pair within the ``EXT-X-ASSET``tag. If you specify a value, you must also specify a corresponding key.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the program.

nested_items.name: ChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the channel that the program belongs to.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the program was created.

nested_items.name: LiveSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the LiveSource for this Program.

nested_items.name: ProgramName
nested_items.description: The name of the program.

nested_items.name: ScheduledStartTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the program is scheduled to start in ISO 8601 format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). For example, the value 2021-03-27T17:48:16.751Z represents March 27, 2021 at 17:48:16.751 UTC.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The source location name.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The name that's used to refer to a VOD source.

nested_items.name: ClipRange
nested_items.description: The clip range configuration settings.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The end offset of the clip range, in milliseconds, starting from the beginning of the VOD source associated with the program.

nested_items.name: StartOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The start offset of the clip range, in milliseconds. This offset truncates the start at the number of milliseconds into the duration of the VOD source.

nested_items.name: DurationMillis
nested_items.description: The duration of the live program in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: AudienceMedia
nested_items.description: The list of AudienceMedia defined in program.

nested_items.name: Audience
nested_items.description: The Audience defined in AudienceMedia.

nested_items.name: AlternateMedia
nested_items.description: The list of AlternateMedia defined in AudienceMedia.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The name of the source location for alternateMedia.

nested_items.name: LiveSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the live source for alternateMedia.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the VOD source for alternateMedia.

nested_items.name: ClipRange
nested_items.description: Clip range configuration for the VOD source associated with the program.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The end offset of the clip range, in milliseconds, starting from the beginning of the VOD source associated with the program.

nested_items.name: StartOffsetMillis
nested_items.description: The start offset of the clip range, in milliseconds. This offset truncates the start at the number of milliseconds into the duration of the VOD source.

nested_items.name: ScheduledStartTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The date and time that the alternateMedia is scheduled to start, in epoch milliseconds.

nested_items.name: AdBreaks
nested_items.description: Ad break configuration parameters defined in AlternateMedia.

nested_items.name: MessageType
nested_items.description: The SCTE-35 ad insertion type. Accepted value: SPLICE_INSERT, TIME_SIGNAL.

nested_items.name: OffsetMillis
nested_items.description: How long (in milliseconds) after the beginning of the program that an ad starts. This value must fall within 100ms of a segment boundary, otherwise the ad break will be skipped.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The name of the source location where the slate VOD source is stored.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The slate VOD source name. The VOD source must already exist in a source location before it can be used for slate.

nested_items.name: SpliceInsertMessage
nested_items.description: This defines the SCTE-35 splice_insert() message inserted around the ad. For information about using splice_insert(), see the SCTE-35 specficiaiton, section 9.7.3.1.

nested_items.name: AvailNum
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.avail_num, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: AvailsExpected
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.avails_expected, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: SpliceEventId
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.splice_event_id, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: UniqueProgramId
nested_items.description: This is written to splice_insert.unique_program_id, as defined in section 9.7.3.1 of the SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 0. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive.

nested_items.name: TimeSignalMessage
nested_items.description: Defines the SCTE-35 time_signal message inserted around the ad.

nested_items.name: SegmentationDescriptors
nested_items.description: The configurations for the SCTE-35 segmentation_descriptor message(s) sent with the time_signal message.

nested_items.name: SegmentationEventId
nested_items.description: The Event Identifier to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_event_id message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: SegmentationUpidType
nested_items.description: The Upid Type to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_upid_type message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 14.

nested_items.name: SegmentationUpid
nested_items.description: The Upid to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_upid message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. The value must be a hexadecimal string containing only the characters 0 though 9 and A through F. The default value is '' (an empty string).

nested_items.name: SegmentationTypeId
nested_items.description: The Type Identifier to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segmentation_type_id message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 48.

nested_items.name: SegmentNum
nested_items.description: The segment number to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.segment_num message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 0.

nested_items.name: SegmentsExpected
nested_items.description: The number of segments expected, which is assigned to the segmentation_descriptor.segments_expectedS message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is 0.

nested_items.name: SubSegmentNum
nested_items.description: The sub-segment number to assign to the segmentation_descriptor.sub_segment_num message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The defualt value is null.

nested_items.name: SubSegmentsExpected
nested_items.description: The number of sub-segments expected, which is assigned to the segmentation_descriptor.sub_segments_expected message, as defined in section 10.3.3.1 of the 2022 SCTE-35 specification. Values must be between 0 and 256, inclusive. The default value is null.

nested_items.name: AdBreakMetadata
nested_items.description: Defines a list of key/value pairs that MediaTailor generates within the EXT-X-ASSET``tag for ``SCTE35_ENHANCED output.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: For SCTE35_ENHANCED output, defines a key. MediaTailor takes this key, and its associated value, and generates the key/value pair within the ``EXT-X-ASSET``tag. If you specify a key, you must also specify a corresponding value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: For SCTE35_ENHANCED output, defines a value. MediaTailor; takes this value, and its associated key, and generates the key/value pair within the ``EXT-X-ASSET``tag. If you specify a value, you must also specify a corresponding key.

nested_items.name: DurationMillis
nested_items.description: The duration of the alternateMedia in milliseconds.
